duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and facilitate all activities related to the pre-marketing of the REO assets, ensuring timeliness and quality of workmanship.
Oversee vendors, ensuring client service level agreements are being met and the preservation of assets.
Review Asset Management system of record, ensuring task completion, and data integrity maintenance.
Respond to incoming email and phone calls from vendors and business partners, handling escalations and ad hoc requests.
Review client/investor matrices, code enforcement/violation, and process incoming bids.
Assist with special projects and maintain consistent attendance as per company policies.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent. Bachelor's degree preferred.
